## Form

> Form follows function that has been misunderstood. <span>Form and function should be one, joined in a spiritual union.</span><!-- .element: class="fragment" -->


> <cite>[Frank Lloyd Wright][1]</cite><!-- .element: class="fragment" -->


[1]:#
